name: Konstantin Sekret
label: TeamLead / FullStack / Typescript Developer
summary: I am a senior expert with more than 13 years of experience in software development across various roles and areas of responsibility. Over the past 10+ years, I have primarily focused on the fintech sector. Due to the specifics of the projects and companies I have worked with, I have had the opportunity to work on management tools, DevOps tools, and overall infrastructure.
